blog.name: savedaredevilsubmissions
blog.title: #SaveDaredevil Submissions
blog.description: This Tumblr works with savedaredevil.com to celebrate the incredible talent of the Fandom Without Fear. Contact us with any queries about the Fanworks Initiative. Want to get involved? Show Marvel our passion by submitting your Daredevil-inspired fanwork here for us to share with the world.

summary: You guys should check out the council of geeks channel on youtube. He's a pretty cool guy who does Doctor Who and Marvel...
body: You guys should check out the council of geeks channel on youtube. He’s a pretty cool guy who does Doctor Who and Marvel reviews, as well as other things, and has some interesting videos on various topics. You should also check out his patreon page.

blog.name: craigsheldonwriter
blog.title: Craig Sheldon
blog.description: I write about films for @thefilmagazine and @CultVultures.

summary: From Captive Maiden to Captain Marvel - The Rise of the Female Action Hero
title: From Captive Maiden to Captain Marvel - The Rise of the Female Action Hero
excerpt: Captain Marvel is Marvel Studios' first female superhero movie lead, but it has been a long time coming. Craig Sheldon chronicles the development of female action heroes in Hollywood film.
description: With Captain Marvel just around the corner, join me as I examine the rise of the female action hero.

reblog.comment: With Captain Marvel just around the corner, join me as I examine the rise of the female action hero.

trail.content_raw: With Captain Marvel just around the corner, join me as I examine the rise of the female action hero.
trail.content: With Captain Marvel just around the corner, join me as I examine the rise of the female action hero.

blog.name: everycharacterisamarvel
blog.title: Every Character Is A Marvel
blog.description: I am a newbie when it comes to Marvel comics and its enormous amount of characters. Get ready for posts about new characters that I discover. I have another page title The DC Dunce where I do the same but with DC characters. Wish me luck!

title: Nikki
body:
“Snark, Skrull, Badoon – doesn’t matter! You’re all the same to me. Sneaky, creepy, slimy…no good, egg-laying cold-blooded…lizards! And I hate lizards!” - Nikki

Real Name: Nicholette Gold

Gender: Female

Height: 5′ 8″

Weight: 130 lbs (59 kg)

Eyes: Red

Hair: Orange

Skin: Grey

Unusual Features: Flaming hair

Powers:

  1. Mercurian Physiology

Abilities:

  1. Hand-to-Hand Combat
  2. Gymnastics
  3. Sharp-Shooting 

Weaknesses:

  1. Prejudice Against Reptilian-Based Aliens

Equipment:

  1. Wrist Blasters
  2. Stun Gun
  3. Laser Pistol

Universe: Earth-691

Citizenship: Earth colony on Mercury

Base of Operations: Spaceship Captain America 

Marital Status: Single

Origin: Mercurian (Genetically-modified human)

Occupation: Adventurer

Education: Autodidact

First Appearance: Marvel Presents #4 (April, 1976)

Powers

Mercurian Physiology: Nikki is a member of a genetically engineered offshoot of humanity whose traits were designed for survival in the harsh conditions of the planet Mercury. As such, she has the ability to see in intense light, and has a high degree of resistance to heat and most types of radiation. Her hair is made of fire and she could potentially burn someone just by touching someone with any part of her body. She would often take complete water baths just to cool her body temperature enough to share physical touch with Charlie-27.

Abilities

Hand-to-Hand Combat

Gymnastics

Sharp-Shooting 

Weaknesses

Prejudice Against Reptilian-Based Aliens

Equipment

Wrist Blasters

Stun Gun

Laser Pistol

History

Nicholette “Nikki” Gold was born on the planet Mercury in the 31st Century. When she was a child, the Badoon invaded the solar system and her home planet, killing her parents before her eyes. She managed to flee and was eventually found by the Guardians of the Galaxy in an abandoned spacecraft. She joined the Guardians, seeking excitement and adventure after years of solitude. She joined with Vance Astro in a metaphysical union in a successful attempt to use the force of human love to destroy the Topographical Man.

Nikki traveled to the present with the other Guardians and assisted the Avengers in battle against Korvac. She traveled to the present again and battled Hammer and Anvil alongside Spider-Man.

Alongside the Guardians, Nikki later went on a quest to find the lost shield of Captain America, and battled Taserface. She battled the Stark alongside the other Guardians. She encountered Firelord. She battled the super-humanoid team known as Force alongside the Guardians.

During her time on the team, Nikki had a romantic relationship with Charlie-27, though they later amicably separated. She became attracted to newcomer Talon though he simply wished to remain friends.

blog.name: hoperesideswithinthismess
blog.title: This New Problem I Call Joy
blog.description: My name (and not my favorite color) is Red. I'm a guy. This tumblr of mine is primarily for fannish things or esoteric amusements. Occasionally something serious or thought provoking might creep in, and that's fine by me. I like to think I'm a nice sort of bloke. I take people as they are. If you want to be friends, cool, let's be friends.

blog.name: why-i-love-comics
blog.title: A blog dedicated to all your favorite moments
blog.description: Batman, Say it fast. Really fast. As fast as you can. Over and over. So what do you hear? Badman. Bad. Man. Batman. Badman. To me... Now and forever... one and                                             the same. - Peter J. Tomasi                                                                         all spoiler posts are tagged "wednesday spoilers"                                             add me on snapchapt! taskrnaster (with an RN instead of M)

summary:
See you at @ice_comic_con Winter Special - Brighton, @c2e2 and @wondercon this month!

In the meantime, here's Silk  pre-show...
caption:
See you at @ice_comic_con Winter Special - Brighton, @c2e2 and @wondercon this month!

In the meantime, here’s Silk pre-show commission WIP (digital pencils). For info about commissions write me at: info@marcosantucciart.com

#c2e2 #wondercon #ice #marvel #marvelcomics #silk #spiderman #marcosantucci (presso Arezzo, Italy)
https://www.instagram.com/p/BueUYG2h40X/?utm_source=ig_tumblr_share&igshid=199hnjxs5ldeh

summary: Marvel Subscriptions :: Never miss an issue of Avengers, Spider-Man, X-Men & more Marvel Comics
body:
Marvel Subscriptions

Hey y’all probably already know about this but did you could save a lot and get the comics sent to your door?

https://subscriptions.marvel.com/store/search.asp

Marvel Subscriptions :: Never miss an issue of Avengers, Spider-Man, X-Men & more Marvel Comics

blog.name: ao3feed-tonystark
blog.title: Ao3-Feed: Tony Stark
blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive Of Our Own under the Tony Stark tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed.

title: Not So Alone
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2Vpv6lC

by Split_Strengthen_Survive

Aunt May is dead, and Tony has adopted Peter. That’s great right?

Maybe it is, until the Avengers learn of the kid Tony has taken in. Not to mention the surprises that come to light.

Nothing will be the same for Queens’ Friendly Neighborhood Spider-Man. Too bad nobody thought to prepare Peter for his life to be turned upside down.

Words: 2544, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Spider-Man: Homecoming (2017), The Avengers (Marvel) - All Media Types
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: Gen, M/M
  • Characters: Peter Parker, Tony Stark, James “Bucky” Barnes, Steve Rogers, Natasha Romanov (Marvel), Clint Barton, Bruce Banner, Scott Lang, T'Challa (Marvel), Shuri (Marvel), Sam Wilson (Marvel), Thor (Marvel), Wanda Maximoff, Loki (Marvel), Flash Thompson, Michelle Jones, Ned Leeds, Vision (Marvel)
  • Relationships: Tony/Peter-Father/Son
  • Additional Tags: Tony Stark Has A Heart, Tony Stark Acting as Peter Parker’s Parental Figure, Selectively Mute Peter, Avengers Family, Protective Avengers, Protective Bucky Barnes, Hurt Peter Parker, Original Female Character(s) - Freeform, Animal Companions, Hydra Peter Parker, Peter Parker Needs a Hug, Adopted Peter Parker, Flashbacks, Lost Memory, memory wipes, Dead May Parker (Spider-Man), Post-Spider-Man: Homecoming, AU Canon Divergence


read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2Vpv6lC
